name: Dice Code
description:
This fun, colourful, code solving game is unique, challenging and a joy to play. The game incorporates the randomness of dice with the fun of Master Mind.

Solve the Dice Code by matching the dice sum and by finding the correct dice that make up the code. You will also need to place them in the correct sequence. 4 levels of difficulty or let the app decide by choosing a random difficulty for you.

If you like "Master Mind" you'll LOVE Dice Code
